item.description: FurryTails|What is Freeze-Dried Pet Food? FAQ on Freeze-Dried Pet Food Freeze-dried pet food refers to pet food made by rapidly freezing raw meat ingredients and then removing the moisture in a vacuum low-temperature environment.
